name: This Way to Paradise
description:
Music: Royalty Free Music from Bensound (https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/the-elevator-bossa-nova)

made in scratch

click and hold to make your character move in the direction it is pointing

red- restart level

edge- restart level

blue- teleport to random position

purple- go back 1 level

orange- go back to level 1
